item.title: Azure History
item.description: Intro I’m going to start this new blog writing about the history of Azure, the public Cloud Computing offer presented by Microsoft in October 2008 and released to the public on February 1, 2010. Azure was presented by Ray Ozzie in the Microsoft PDC - Professional Developers Conference 2008 in Los Angeles Convention Center in Los Angeles, California (USA).
